description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the location where Robin joins the crew.

keyEvents.title: Marines Pursue Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry comes under attack from Marine ships led by Hina, appearing to take damage.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ship enduring another battle as the crew escapes from Arabasta.

keyEvents.title: Metal Pipes Save the Day
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses metal pipes stored on the ship to disable pursuing Marine vessels.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's storage of random items proves useful once again.

keyEvents.title: Robin Appears on Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Nico Robin emerges from hiding inside the Going Merry, revealing she stowed away on the ship.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry becomes the location of Robin's dramatic entrance to join the crew.

keyEvents.title: Robin Joins on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Robin officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates while aboard the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most important moments in the ship's history - gaining its seventh crew member.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and carrying the crew away from Arabasta

description: A desert kingdom in the Grand Line. This episode shows the aftermath and recovery following the Baroque Works conflict.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Arabasta
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully escape Arabasta waters after their adventure in the kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Arabasta Arc as the crew leaves the kingdom behind.

keyEvents.title: Arabasta Kingdom Recovery Begins
keyEvents.description: Scenes show the Arabasta Kingdom beginning its recovery process after the Baroque Works conflict.
keyEvents.significance: Provides closure to the arc by showing the positive aftermath of the Straw Hats' actions.

keyEvents.title: Pell Returns to Arabasta
keyEvents.description: Pell is revealed to have survived and returns to Alubarna, approaching his own grave.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the kingdom's complete recovery as even those thought lost have returned.

statusHistory.reason: Kingdom is recovering and rebuilding after the Baroque Works crisis

description: The capital city of Arabasta Kingdom. This episode shows the city in recovery mode after the conflict.

keyEvents.title: Pell at His Grave in Alubarna
keyEvents.description: Pell approaches his own grave in Alubarna with disturbed astonishment, confirming his survival.
keyEvents.significance: Provides an emotional moment of closure for Pell's sacrifice.

statusHistory.reason: City is recovering from the battle and near-destruction
